name: PoE_Official_Mod_Test2
description:
This will devlope into the official mod for PoE.
This is being released ahead of schedule as a quick patch.
As of now some items have a stack limit 10x that of default. Encoubrance weight on those items has been halved. These items include:
Harvested items
Building supplies
Arrows
Potions (The weight was left at default)

There is still some cleaning up to do and more features to add
author: DarthN8er369
